verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> Now after מ֥וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> it came to pass that the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֔וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun מְשָׁרֵ֥ת <S%H8334><s%> minister מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses' לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עַבְדִּ֖י <S%H5650><s%> my servant מֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> is dead וְעַתָּה֩ <S%H6258><s%> now ק֨וּם <S%H6965><s%> now therefore arise עֲבֹ֜ר <S%H5674><s%> go over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> this Jordan הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> thou and all this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> which I do give לָהֶ֖ם לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to them [even] to the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every מָק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> Every place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּדְרֹ֧ךְ <S%H1869><s%> shall tread upon כַּֽף־ <S%H3709><s%> that the sole רַגְלְכֶ֛ם <S%H7272><s%> of your foot בּ֖וֹ לָכֶ֣ם נְתַתִּ֑יו <S%H5414><s%> that have I given כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> unto you as I said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses

מֵהַמִּדְבָּר֩ <S%H4057><s%> From the wilderness וְהַלְּבָנ֨וֹן <S%H3844><s%> and this Lebanon הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> and this וְֽעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַנָּהָ֧ר <S%H5104><s%> river הַגָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> even unto the great נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> the river פְּרָ֗ת <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all the land הַֽחִתִּ֔ים <S%H2850><s%> of the Hittites וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and unto the great מְב֣וֹא <S%H3996><s%> toward the going down הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become גְּבוּלְכֶֽם׃ <S%H1366><s%> shall be your coast

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <S%H3320><s%> be able to stand אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> There shall not any man לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> thee all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <S%H2416><s%> of thy life כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> I הָיִ֤יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have been עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> as I was with Moses אֶהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> have been עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> No אַרְפְּךָ֖ <S%H7503><s%> [so] I will be with thee I will not fail וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> No אֶעֶזְבֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5800><s%> thee nor forsake

חֲזַ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> Be strong וֶאֱמָ֑ץ <S%H553><s%> and of a good courage כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you תַּנְחִיל֙ <S%H5157><s%> shalt thou divide for an inheritance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> for unto this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לַאֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> unto their fathers לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָהֶֽם׃

רַק֩ <S%H7535><s%> but חֲזַ֨ק <S%H2388><s%> Only be thou strong וֶֽאֱמַ֜ץ <S%H553><s%> courageous מְאֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> and very לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> that thou mayest observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> to do כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַתּוֹרָ֗ה <S%H8451><s%> according to all the law אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוְּךָ֙ <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> my servant אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> thee turn מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at יָמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> not from it [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <S%H8040><s%> or [to] the left לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> so תַּשְׂכִּ֔יל <S%H7919><s%> that thou mayest prosper בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> go

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָמ֡וּשׁ <S%H4185><s%> shall not depart סֵפֶר֩ <S%H5612><s%> This book הַתּוֹרָ֨ה <S%H8451><s%> of the law הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> This מִפִּ֗יךָ <S%H6310><s%> out of thy mouth וְהָגִ֤יתָ <S%H1897><s%> but thou shalt meditate בּוֹ֙ יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> therein day וָלַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> so תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> that thou mayest observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַכָּת֖וּב <S%H3789><s%> according to all that is written בּ֑וֹ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> then תַּצְלִ֥יחַ <S%H6743><s%> prosperous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּרָכֶ֖ךָ <S%H1870><s%> thy way וְאָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> and then תַּשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <S%H7919><s%> and then thou shalt have good success

הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not צִוִּיתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6680><s%> Have not I commanded חֲזַ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> thee? Be strong וֶאֱמָ֔ץ <S%H553><s%> and of a good courage אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲרֹ֖ץ <S%H6206><s%> be not afraid וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּחָ֑ת <S%H2865><s%> neither be thou dismayed כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עִמְּךָ֙ <S%H5973><s%> for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> go פ
וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> Then Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֹׁטְרֵ֥י <S%H7860><s%> the officers הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

עִבְר֣וּ ׀ <S%H5674><s%> Pass בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> through הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <S%H4264><s%> the host וְצַוּ֤וּ <S%H6680><s%> and command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָכִ֥ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> Prepare לָכֶ֖ם צֵידָ֑ה <S%H6720><s%> you victuals כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> for בְּע֣וֹד ׀ <S%H5750><s%> within שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> for within three יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you עֹֽבְרִים֙ <S%H5674><s%> ye shall pass over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> this Jordan הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> to go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָכֶ֖ם לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> you to possess ס

וְלָרֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <S%H7206><s%> And to the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֔י <S%H1425><s%> and to the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> and to half שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

זָכוֹר֙ <S%H2142><s%> Remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> you saying יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> your God מֵנִ֣יחַ <S%H5117><s%> hath given you rest לָכֶ֔ם וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and hath given לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you this land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

נְשֵׁיכֶ֣ם <S%H802><s%> Your wives טַפְּכֶם֮ <S%H2945><s%> your little ones וּמִקְנֵיכֶם֒ <S%H4735><s%> and your cattle יֵשְׁב֕וּ <S%H3427><s%> shall remain בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָכֶ֛ם מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> you on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וְאַתֶּם֩ <S%H859><s%> you תַּעַבְר֨וּ <S%H5674><s%> but ye shall pass חֲמֻשִׁ֜ים <S%H2571><s%> armed לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲחֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H251><s%> your brethren כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <S%H1368><s%> all the mighty הַחַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> men of valour וַעֲזַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5826><s%> and help אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

עַ֠ד <S%H5704><s%> until אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יָנִ֨יחַ <S%H5117><s%> rest יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> Until the LORD לַֽאֲחֵיכֶם֮ <S%H251><s%> your brethren כָּכֶם֒ וְיָרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> as [he hath given] you and they also have possessed גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָהֶ֑ם וְשַׁבְתֶּ֞ם <S%H7725><s%> them then ye shall return לְאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land יְרֻשַּׁתְכֶם֙ <S%H3425><s%> of your possession וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <S%H3423><s%> and enjoy אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָכֶ֗ם מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> it which Moses עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> servant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S בְּעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> you on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan מִזְרַ֥ח <S%H4217><s%> east side הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> east side

וַֽיַּעֲנ֔וּ <S%H6030><s%> And they answered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> All אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and whithersoever צִוִּיתָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H6680><s%> All that thou commandest נַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> us we will do וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you תִּשְׁלָחֵ֖נוּ <S%H7971><s%> thou sendest נֵלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> will go

כְּכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> we שָׁמַ֙עְנוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> According as we hearkened אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so נִשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> in all things so will we hearken אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> about רַ֠ק <S%H7535><s%> but יִֽהְיֶ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee only the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> was with מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> be with thee as he was with Moses

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Whosoever אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יַמְרֶ֣ה <S%H4784><s%> [he be] that doth rebel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֗יךָ <S%H6310><s%> against thy commandment וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and does not יִשְׁמַ֧ע <S%H8085><s%> and will not hearken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרֶ֛יךָ <S%H1697><s%> unto thy words לְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who תְּצַוֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H6680><s%> in all that thou commandest יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> him he shall be put to death רַ֖ק <S%H7535><s%> but חֲזַ֥ק <S%H2388><s%> only be strong וֶאֱמָֽץ׃ <S%H553><s%> and of a good courage פ
